#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	int t, n, cnt;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {
	    cnt = 0;
	    cin >> n;
	    map<string, int> mp;
	    string s;
	    while (n--) {
	        cin >> s;
	        if(mp[s]) {
	            mp[s]--;
	            cnt--;
	        } else {
	            mp[s]++;
	            cnt++;
	        }
	    }
	    cout << cnt << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
